00009 const SimpleString VariableAttribute::access_constant_str = "constant";
00010 const SimpleString VariableAttribute::access_read_str = "read";
00011 const SimpleString VariableAttribute::access_readwrite_str = "readWrite";

00016 {
00017     access = ReadAccess;
00018     Initialised = false;

00028 const SimpleString& VariableAttribute::AccessToStr(VariableAccessType a)
00029 {
00030     if(a == ConstantAccess) return access_constant_str;
00031     if(a == ReadAccess) return access_read_str;
00032     return access_readwrite_str;
00033 }

00040 void VariableAttribute::GenerateShortDescription(SimpleString& str)
00041 {
00042     GenerateHeaderDescription(variable_str, GetName(), str);
00043 }
00044
00045 void VariableAttribute::GenerateLongDescription(SimpleString& str)
00046 {
00047     GenerateHeaderDescription(variable_str, GetName(), str, false);
00048
00049     str += "<value>";
00050     PutAValueInCData(GetValue(), str);
00051     str += "</value>";
00052     if(defaultValue != "")
00053     {
00054         str += "<default>";
00055         PutAValueInCData(defaultValue, str);
00056         str += "</default>";
00057     }
00058
00059     str = str + "<access>"+AccessToStr(access)+"</access>";
00060     str = str + "<type>"+type+"</type>";
00061     AddTagDescriptionToStr(str);
00062     str = str + "</variable>";
00063 }

00078 void VariableAttribute::Display()
00079 {
00080     printf("Name : %s\n", GetName().GetStr() );
00081     printf("Type : %s\n", type.GetStr());
00082     printf("Default Value : %s\n", defaultValue.GetStr());
00083     printf("Last Value : %s\n", valueStr.GetStr());
00084     printf("Access : %s\n", AccessToStr(access).GetStr());
00085 }

00087
00088 void VariableAttribute::SetValue(const SimpleString value_str)
00089 {
00090     // ask to all listener if we can change the value
00091     Listeners.Lock();
00092     for( Listeners.First(); Listeners.NotAtEnd(); Listeners.Next() )
00093     {
00094         VariableAttributeListener * pListener = Listeners.GetCurrent();
00095         if ( pListener->IsValid( this, value_str ) == false )
00096         {
00097             // someone disagree
00098             Listeners.Unlock();
00099             // OmiscidError( "VariableAttribute::SetValue: someone disagree on variable change\n");
00100             return;
00101         }
00102     }
00103
00104     // Ok, change my value
00105     valueStr = value_str;
00106
00107     // Initialised !!
00108     Initialised = true;
00109
00110     // Ok the value has change, send information back to people
00111     for( Listeners.First(); Listeners.NotAtEnd(); Listeners.Next() )
00112     {
00113         Listeners.GetCurrent()->VariableChanged( this );
00114     }
00115
00116     Listeners.Unlock();
00117 }

00119 void VariableAttribute::SetValueFromControl(const SimpleString value_str)
00120 {
00121     // Ok, change my value
00122     valueStr = value_str;
00123
00124     // Initialised !!
00125     Initialised = true;
00126
00127     // Ok the value has change, send information back to people
00128     Listeners.Lock();
00129     for( Listeners.First(); Listeners.NotAtEnd(); Listeners.Next() )
00130     {
00131         Listeners.GetCurrent()->VariableChanged( this );
00132     }
00133
00134     Listeners.Unlock();
00135 }

00137 void VariableAttribute::ExtractDataFromXml(xmlNodePtr node)
00138 {
00139
00140     xmlAttrPtr attr_name = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);
00141     if(attr_name)
00142     {
00143         SetName(SimpleString((const char*)attr_name->children->content));
00144     }
00145
00146     //child value
00147     SimpleString tmp_value("");
00148     xmlNodePtr cur_node = node->children;
00149     for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00150     {
00151         if (cur_node->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE)
00152         {
00153             SimpleString cur_name = (const char*)cur_node->name;
00154             if( cur_name == "description" )
00155             {
00156                 SetDescription(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children));
00157             }
00158             else if( cur_name == "formatDescription" )
00159             {
00160                 SetFormatDescription(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children));
00161             }
00162             else if ( cur_name == "value" )
00163             {
00164                 tmp_value = XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children);
00165                 //vattr->SetValue((const char*)cur_node->children->content);
00166             }
00167             else if ( cur_name == "default" )
00168             {
00169                 SetDefaultValue(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children));
00170             }
00171             else if ( cur_name == "type" )
00172             {
00173                 SetType(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children).GetStr());
00174             }
00175             else if ( cur_name == "access" )
00176             {
00177                 SimpleString content = XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children);
00178                 if( content == access_read_str )
00179                 {
00180                     SetAccessRead();
00181                 }
00182                 else if( content == access_readwrite_str )
00183                 {
00184                     SetAccessReadWrite();
00185                 }
00186                 else if( content == access_constant_str )
00187                 {
00188                     SetAccessConstant();
00189                 }
00190                 else
00191                 {
00192                     OmiscidError( "Unknow Access kind : %s\n", cur_node->children->content );
00193                 }
00194             }
00195             else OmiscidError( "Unwaited Tag : %s\n", cur_name.GetStr() );
00196         }
00197     }
00198
00199     SetValue(tmp_value);
00200 }

00232 SimpleString& VariableAttribute::GetValue()
00233 {
00234     if ( Initialised == false )
00235     {
00236         SimpleString TmpString;
00237         TmpString = GetName();
00238         TmpString += " not initialised";
00239         throw  SimpleException( TmpString );
00240     }
00241     return valueStr;
00242 }

00258
00259 bool VariableAttribute::CanBeModifiedFromInside(ControlServerStatus status) const
00260 {
00261     if ( access == ConstantAccess && status == STATUS_RUNNING )
00262     {
00263         return false;
00264     }
00265     return true;
00266 }
00267
00268  bool VariableAttribute::CanBeModifiedFromOutside(ControlServerStatus status) const
00269 {
00270     return (access == ReadWriteAccess || (access == ConstantAccess && status != STATUS_RUNNING));
00271 }
00272
00276 bool VariableAttribute::AddListener( VariableAttributeListener * ListenerToAdd )
00277 {
00278     if ( ListenerToAdd == NULL )
00279     {
00280         return false;
00281     }
00282
00283     Listeners.Lock();
00284     // look if it is already there..
00285     for( Listeners.First(); Listeners.NotAtEnd(); Listeners.Next() )
00286     {
00287         if ( Listeners.GetCurrent() == ListenerToAdd )
00288         {
00289             Listeners.Unlock();
00290             return false;
00291         }
00292     }
00293
00294     // add it
00295     Listeners.Add( ListenerToAdd );
00296
00297     Listeners.Unlock();
00298
00299     return true;
00300 }
00301
00305 bool VariableAttribute::RemoveListener( VariableAttributeListener *  ListenerToAdd )
00306 {
00307     bool ret;
00308
00309     if ( ListenerToAdd == NULL )
00310     {
00311         return false;
00312     }
00313
00314     // Remove it if any
00315     Listeners.Lock();
00316     ret = Listeners.Remove(ListenerToAdd);
00317     Listeners.Unlock();
00318
00319     return ret;
00320 }
00321
00322 unsigned int VariableAttribute::GetNumberOfListeners()
00323 {
00324     unsigned int ret;
00325
00326     Listeners.Lock();
00327     ret = Listeners.GetNumberOfElements();
00328     Listeners.Unlock();
00329
00330     return ret;
00331 }
